function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Use cleaning substances with proven effectiveness against the virus","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Avoid using products containing sodium laureth sulfate for sensitive skin","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Providing clear and evidence-based guidance on appropriate social distancing measures","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting further research to improve understanding of droplet behavior and propagation, and updating social distancing guidelines accordingly.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilizing advanced fluid dynamics models to account for complex droplet behavior and interactions in the built environment.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improving experimental methods, such as using advanced high-speed photography and particle detection techniques, to capture a wider range of droplet sizes and trajectories.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Consideration of respiratory event directionality in layout design, such as desk placement","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct further research to identify appropriate social distancing distances based on factors influencing droplet and aerosol behavior","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proper education and training on the correct usage of face masks and coverings","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Priority access to high-quality masks and custom solutions for vulnerable populations","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote and enforce the use of face masks in public places, provide clear guidelines on how to wear them properly","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict enforcement of face mask regulations, increase public awareness of the importance of compliance","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Campaigns to increase public awareness of the benefits of face masks, provide access to affordable or free face masks","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote and enforce the consistent and correct wearing of face masks in high-risk areas, along with other preventive measures","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct and communicate research on the effectiveness of cloth-based face masks, and provide clear guidelines on their use","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide clear and consistent public health messaging on the importance of combining face masks with other preventive measures","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of effective face coverings and masks, proper fit and usage, and adherence to guidelines on emission control during expiratory activities.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encourage the use of more effective face coverings and masks for source control, and provide guidelines on the appropriate use of face shields in conjunction with other protective measures.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote proper mask-wearing behavior and education on mask fitting","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote and enforce universal masking policies, provide subsidies for mask distribution","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging the use of face shields in conjunction with face masks or coverings to provide comprehensive protection against airborne particles and aerosols.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adapting guidance to accommodate hoh individuals through the use of clear face masks or novel technologies such as captioning apps.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promoting the adoption of face masks and coverings as a preventive measure, particularly in situations where the benefits outweigh the risks.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Maximizing outdoor air ventilation and reducing occupancy in indoor spaces","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing source reduction strategies, such as timetabling and purging between events","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promoting and enforcing mask-wearing in public settings, along with education on proper mask use","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure thorough purging and cleaning of rooms between events, increase outdoor air supply rate","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use accurate room-change time scale calculations, consider professional guidance","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing regular purging and cleaning of enclosed spaces, reducing occupancy, and introducing unoccupied periods with increased ventilation.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing regular purging and cleaning of enclosed spaces, and reducing occupancy to minimize air disturbance.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing ventilation systems to quickly remove aerosols from the space, reducing the risk of exposure.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementing frequent and thorough cleaning procedures, encouraging the use of face masks, and maintaining physical distancing in crowded spaces.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increasing air exchange rates, reducing occupancy levels, and implementing air disinfection technologies to minimize aerosol exposure.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Validation of laboratory simulations through real-world data and historical disease spread patterns to improve the accuracy of the models.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Optimizing ventilation systems to counteract the dispersion caused by people movement and implementing strict ventilation control measures during infectious disease outbreaks.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing strict control measures, such as mask mandates, social distancing protocols, and surface disinfection routines, to mitigate airborne transmission in the built environment.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing measures to reduce occupancy levels, improve ventilation, and enforce mask-wearing","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing ventilation rate, reducing occupancy levels, and improving air filtration systems","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limiting movement, enforcing social distancing, and using physical barriers","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase ventilation rates, reduce duration of exposure, and reduce aerosol sources through occupancy control and masks","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduce occupancy levels, promote use of face masks, and optimize building layouts for better airflow","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Providing guidance to resolve the conflict and optimize ventilation systems.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Focusing efforts on estimating the change in likelihood of airborne infection under different scenarios and assumptions.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exploring the incorporation of dose-response models in risk estimation studies for covid-19.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use advanced ventilation system with filtration and air purification to ensure even distribution of outdoor air and elimination of virus particles","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement temperature control systems and consider heat production when designing ventilation strategy to minimize airflow complexity","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement continuous air monitoring and filtration systems to detect and eliminate virus particles regardless of the source location","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Seal cracks in the building fabric, use pressure testing to identify infiltration points, and implement ventilation control measures","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use direct air flow measurements, monitor co2 levels, and implement ventilation rate monitoring systems","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use multiple parameters to assess airborne infection risk, not just co2 data","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"}]}
